Optional: Server support¶

Slurm support¶

Coming soon.

ssh connection GUI support¶

If you connect to your server via ssh and want to use the sequanix GUI to run the pipeline make sure to use the -X option to enable forwarding of

ssh -X *destination*

Note

If you want to use DICAST on a server via ssh from a Windows system and want to use the sequanix GUI, make also sure you have an X11 server installed and running.
